api_name: API-Xendit: Initiate PayLater plans with FEE and DISCOUNT (even amount)

body.raw:
{
  "customer_id": "491630ba-ad38-411d-978f-7bbdd4209782",
  "channel_code": "ID_KREDIVO",
  "currency": "IDR",
  "amount": 950000,
  "order_items": [
    {
      "type": "PHYSICAL_PRODUCT",
      "reference_id": "SKU_backtoschool-promotion123",
      "name": "Nymbus twothousand",
      "net_unit_amount": 1000000,
      "quantity": 1,
      "url": "https://www.zngmyhome.com/nymbus",
      "category": "Sports",
      "subcategory": "Equipment",
      "description": "Sports equipment for quidditch"
    },
    {
      "type": "DISCOUNT",
      "reference_id": "1212campaign-012",
      "name": "1212 Campaign",
      "net_unit_amount": -100000,
      "quantity": 1,
      "description": "10% discount 1212"
    },
    {
      "type": "FEE",
      "reference_id": "SP123",
      "name": "Special-packaging001",
      "net_unit_amount": 50000,
      "quantity": 1,
      "description": "Packaging with wood box"
    }
  ]
}
